subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The United States Golf Association selected  Rick Hartmann and David Gossett to play with Michelle Wie in what will be the most-watched group at the U.S. Open qualifier at Canoe Brook Country Club in Summit, N.J.
snippet: The United States Golf Association selected  Rick Hartmann and David Gossett to play with Michelle Wie in what will be the most-watched group at the U.S. Open qualifier at Canoe Brook Country Club in Summit, N.J.
